Html:
Hi!

I am trying to use the current version for SQL 2008 but multiple attempts to install (even the REG key hack was attempted) yield the following message when I launch SSMS:

The Add-in 'InternalsViewer.SSMSAddIn.Connect' failed to load or caused an exception.
Would you like to remove this Add-in?
If you choose yes, you will need to reinstall the Add-in to use it again.

Error Message: Class not registered

Error number: 80040154

I have double-checked the paths in the registry and they all seem OK. Any idea what class it is referring to?

Thank you!

Hi,

I get same error on Windows 7 SQL 2008 R2 too.

Please help.

 

Thank you.

Good day,

This version do not work on 2008r2. There is another newer version here:
https://intview2.codeplex.com/

Ronen,

pituach wrote:
Good day,

This version do not work on 2008r2. There is another newer version here:

Ronen,
Thanks for sharing the 2008R2 version, but the hyperlink is incorrect, which made think it was a fake link, anyway, anyone else want to get the 2008R2 version, click this one instead:
https://intview2.codeplex.com/
